triples.evidence: If your time window is short enough, you get a well-controlled count rate

concepts.term: the system is designed to expect only pairs of coincident photons

evidence: The formula shown here calculates the correction factor-combining both the estimated loss from discarded high-order events and the true measurement-to help restore your measured data to the real level
